CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, June 19, 1954, pg. 9 reads: "Homemakers See Latest in Foods, Appliances...7. Bill Carter of the Campbell General Tire Company demonstrated the non-puncture innertube, showed motion pictures on safety and explained the long wear of all General Tires...-Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Bill Carter standing in Campbell General Tire Company booth, in Hunt Armory for the 1954 Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair
